question: Surah Yaseen is to be read after Fajr namaaz
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamualaikum,
Surah Yaseen is to be read after Fajr namaaz,can we read Surah Yaseen after sunrise or anytime before Duhr namaaz.
jazakalla to give time to anwser my question.


ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

Rasulullah (SAW) advised us to recite Sura Yaseen in the beginning of the day. Dhur is already the middle of the day. After sunrise is considered as the beginning of the day.

 

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

 

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
